name: stewing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
stew
[ T ] to cook meat, fish, vegetables, or fruit slowly and gently in a little liquid
[ I ] informal to be angry or worried: You're not still stewing about what happened yesterday, are you?
[ I ] UK to do nothing useful: With jobs so scarce, many young people spend long hours with little to do but drink and stew.
